verses.text: ‘OUA na‘a tuku ke puputu‘u homou loto: tui pīkitai ki he ‘Otua, tui pīkitai foki kiate au.
‘I he ‘api ‘o ‘eku Tamai ‘oku lahi ‘a e ngaahi nofo‘anga: ka ne ‘ikai, pehē kuo u tala kiate kimoutolu, he ko ‘eku ‘alu eni ke teuteu ha potu mo ‘omoutolu.
Pea neongo te u ‘alu ‘o teuteu ha potu mo‘omoutolu, ka ‘oku ou toe ha‘u pē, pea te u ma‘u kimoutolu kiate au; koe‘uhi ko e potu ‘oku ou ‘i ai, ke mou ‘i ai foki.
Pea ko e potu ‘oku ou ‘alu ki ai ‘oku mou ‘ilo hono hala.
Pea lea ki ai ‘a Tōmasi, ‘Eiki, ‘oku ‘ikai te mau ‘ilo pē ko ho‘o me‘a ki fē; pea mau ‘ilo fēfē ai ‘a e hala?
Pea folofola ‘a Sīsū ki ai, Ko au pē ko e Hala, pea mo e Mo‘oni mo e Mo‘ui: ‘oku ‘ikai ha‘u ha taha ki he Tamai ka ‘i he‘ene fou ‘iate au.
Ka ne mou a‘usia ‘a e ‘ilo‘i ‘o‘oku, pehē te mou lāu‘ilo‘i mo ‘eku Tamai; pea ‘oku mou kamata ‘eni ke ‘ilo ‘a ‘Ene ‘Afio, pea kuo mou mātā ia.
Pea lea ‘a Filipe ki ai, ‘eiki, tuku ke mau sio ki he Tamai, pea kuo mau fiemālie leva.
Pea lea ‘a Sīsū kiate ia, Ko futu ‘eku ‘iate kimoutolu, pea kuo te‘eki koā ke ke ‘ilo au, Filipe? Ko ia kuo ne mātā au, kuo ne mātā ‘a e Tamai; pea fēfē ai ho‘o pehē, Tuku ke mau sio ki he Tamai?

‘Ikai ‘oku ke tui, ‘oku ou ‘i he Tamai, pea ko e Tamai ‘oku ‘iate au: ko e ngaahi lea ‘oku ou fai kiate kimoutolu, ‘oku ‘ikai te u lea‘aki meiate au. Ka ko e Tamai ‘oku ne fai ‘ene ngaahi ngāue, he‘ene nofo‘ia au.
Mou tui kiate au, ko au ‘oku ou ‘i he Tamai, mo e Tamai ‘iate au: pea ka ‘ikai, pea mou tui koe‘uhi ko ‘ene ngaahi ngāue.

Ko au ē, ko au ē, ‘oku ou tala atu, Ko ia ‘oku tui pīkitai kiate au, ko e ngaahi ngāue ‘oku ou fai ‘e fai ‘e he toko taha ko ia foki; ‘io, te ne fai ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku hulu atu ‘i he ngaahi me‘a ni; koe‘uhiā ko ‘eku ‘alu ki he Tamai.
Pea ‘ilonga ha me‘a te mou kole ‘i hoku hingoa, te u fai ia, koe‘uhi ke fakalāngilangi‘i ‘a e Tamai ‘i he ‘Alo.
Neongo pē ko e hā ha me‘a te mou kole meiate au ‘i hoku hingoa, te u fai ia.
Kapau ‘oku mou ‘ofa kiate au, te mou tauhi ‘eku ngaahi fekau ‘a‘aku.
Pea te u tala ki he Tamai, pea te ne foaki kiate kimoutolu ha Taukapo ‘e toko taha, koe‘uhi ke ne ‘iate kimoutolu ‘o ta‘engata; ‘io, ko e Laumālie ‘o e Mo‘oni;

‘a ia ‘oku ‘ikai ke fa‘a ma‘u ‘e māmani, koe‘uhi ‘oku ‘ikai te ne sio kiate ia, pe fai ke ‘ilo ia: ka ‘oku mou fai ke ‘ilo ia ‘e kimoutolu; he ‘oku ne nofo ma‘u mo kimoutolu, pea ‘oku ne ‘i. homou loto.
‘E ‘ikai te u ‘alu ‘o tuku kimoutolu ke tuēnoa: ‘oku ou ha‘u pē kiate kimoutolu.
‘Oku toe si‘i pea ‘ikai kei sio kiate au ‘a māmani; ka ka sio ai pē kiate au ‘e kimoutolu, koe‘uhi ‘oku ou mo‘ui pea te mou mo‘ui ai pē.
‘I he ‘aho ko ia te mou ‘ilo, ko au ‘oku ou ‘i he‘eku Tamai, pea mo kimoutolu ‘iate au, pea mo au ‘iate kimoutolu.

Ko ia ‘oku ma‘u ‘eku ngaahi tu‘utu‘uni, mo tauhi ki ai, ko ia ia ‘oku ‘ofa kiate au: pea ko ia ‘oku ‘ofa kiate au ‘e ‘ofeina ia ‘e he‘eku Tamai, pea te u ‘ofa mo au kia ia, pea te u fakahaa‘i kiate ia.
Pea lea ki ai ‘a Siutasi–ka na‘e ‘ikai ko ‘Isikaliote–‘Eiki, ko e hā kuo pehē ai, ho‘o teu fakahaa‘i koe kiate kimautolu, kae ‘ikai ki māmani?
Pea tali ‘e Sīsū ‘o ne pehē ki ai, Kapau ‘oku ‘ofa ha taha kiate au, te ne tauhi ‘eku lea: pea ‘e ‘ofa kiate ia ‘a ‘eku Tamai, pea te ma omi kiate ia, ‘o ma nofo‘anga taha mo ia.
Ko ia ‘oku ‘ikai ke ‘ofa kiate au, ‘oku ‘ikai te ne tauhi ‘eke ngaahi lea: pea ko e lea ‘oku mou fanongo ki ai ‘oku ‘ikai ‘a‘aku, ka ‘a e Tamai na‘a ne fekau mai au.
Ko e ngaahi me‘a ni kuo u tala atu ‘i he‘eku kei ‘iate kimoutolu.

Ka ko e Taukapo, ko e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni, ‘a ia ‘e fekau mai ‘e he Tamai ‘i hoku hingoa, ko e Toko Taha ko ia te ne ako kiate kimoutolu ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē, pea te ne fakamanatu kiate kimoutolu ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē kuo u lea‘aki kiate kimoutolu.

Ko ‘eku ‘alu ‘eni, ka u tuku ha fiemālie kiate kimoutolu; ko ha fiemālie ‘a‘aku ‘oku ou foaki atu kiate kimoutolu: ‘oku ‘ikai hangē ko e foaki ‘a māmani ‘a ‘eku foaki kiate kimoutolu. ‘Oua na‘a tuku ke puputu‘u homou loto, ‘uma‘ā ha‘ane manavahē.
Ne mou fanongo ki he‘eku pehē atu, Ko ‘eku ‘alu ni kau ha‘u kiate kimoutolu. Ka ne mou ‘ofa kiate au, pehē te mou fiefia ‘i he‘eku ‘alu ki he Tamai; koe‘uhi ‘oku lahi ‘a e Tamai ‘iate au.
Pea kuo u tala ni ia kiate kimoutolu ‘i he te‘eki ke hoko, koe‘uhi ‘oka hoko mai ke mou tui.
‘E; ‘ikai te u toe talanoa lahi mo kimoutolu: he ‘oku ha‘u ‘a e ‘eiki ‘o māmani, pea tala‘ehai ‘oku ‘i ai ha‘ane momo‘i me‘a ‘iate au;
ka koe‘uhi pē ke ‘ilo ‘e māmani ‘oku ou ‘ofa ki he Tamai, pea hangē ko hoku tu‘utu‘uni ‘e he Tamai, ‘oku pehē ‘eku fai. Mo u tu‘u, ke tau ‘alu ‘i heni.
